DOC.detailed_description: D-15 to D0: selection - patient information and non-opposition obtained - inclusion and non inclusion criteria check - clinical exam D-1 to D0 : 24 hours diuresis D0 : operation day Before anesthesia : - urine collection (paracetamol metabolites dosage) - blood sampling (glutathion and liver function test) Surgery: - 1st paracetamol intake before closing - Then administration every 6 hours D1 to D4 : - 24 hours urine collection (metabolites dosage) - blood sampling et D1 and D4(glutathion and liver function test) D5 : final clinical exam
DOC.criteria: aortic surgery treatment with intraveinous paracetamol (4 grammes daily during 4 days) patient agrees to participate patient disagrees paracetamol contraindication paracetamol intake 5 days before surgery
